price: Àti pé Èmi kò ṣẹ̀dá àlùjànnú àti ènìyàn bí kò ṣe pé kí wọ́n lè jọ́sìn fún Mi.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
